reviews.review:
I enjoyed this Portal much more than the original because it had a multitude of new mechanics that the first game was lacking and it also flowed much more nicely too. The addition of the backstory behind the aperture science facility and the narration from the characters really made this game. It also had a co-op mode which gave the game a whole new aspect and story with new puzzles and new mechanics.

As with most puzzle based games, I don’t think this has much replay value; however, integration with the steam workshop allows a constant supply of new maps for both single player and co-op so there really is no end to what you can do in this game.
Even better than the first!  Humorous and challenging.
Usually when you have a sequal you want to improve on your first game. This not only improved on what was good, but added more concepts with the gels, and also added Co-Op and now Community maps.
Отличная игра как для сингл плеера так и для кооператива

Portal 2 is one of my all-time favorites. It's such a brilliant game in every respect, and a big improvement on the already great first game. 

This game has it all : challenging and creative puzzles, smart level design, hilarious writing, iconic and endearing characters, incredible voice acting, a fitting electronic soundtrack, a story that leaves you wanting for more, a thrilling co-op campaign where teamwork is key, and a puzzle editor so the fun never ends.

Forever renaming all of my devices as GLaDOS.
Great puzzle game and a great story, full of plot twists and guaranteed to make you completely addicted to this game
Epic Game!

Continuing where Portal left off, Portal 2 plunges you into a whole new (and some very old) Aperture Science Laboratories! New puzzles, new tech, new storylines, two-player mode and a map-making and sharing tool! This game is everything I'd ever wanted and more from the sequel. :)

Portal 2 очень интересная игра, как по сюжету, так и по мультиплееру. Конечно же есть не большие недостатки с тем, что по мультиплееру могут играть только 2 человека, хотелось бы по-больше, но в отсальном всё отлично. Графика в полне нормальная, багов я пока не видел и сюжет, как по мультиплееру, так и по одиночной игре очень интересен. Всем совету эту игру очень затягивает.
This game is pure awesomeness!

Моя оценка 9 из 10.

El éxito de Portal 2 no es ser uno de los mejores juegos jamás hechos, es el de no bajar el listón aun partiendo de un título tan perfecto como Portal. Más allá de que guste o no el género de puzzles, el primer Portal es en sí mismo un curso magistral a todos los niveles de como diseñar un videojuego. Una curva perfecta de aprendizaje, un guión al que no le sobra ni le falta ni una coma, unos personajes que ya son historia de este arte y una jugabilidad absolutamente fascinante. 

Pocas veces un título ha tenido un predecesor más difícil de superar. Y aunque Portal 2 no lo hace, tampoco se queda atrás. Ya no vemos en él esa frescura que nos sorprendió de Portal (algo con lo que no se podía luchar), pero los de Valve lo compensan metiendo nuevas y absorbentes mecánicas y desarrollando un guión que, de nuevo, volverá a ser objeto de estudio (regalando además uno de los mejores finales que se hayan visto en este sector). 

Poco más se puede decir de semejante genialidad. Portal 2 es insuperable excepto para su predecesor. Y con esto está todo dicho.

En sevdiğim oyun. Valve. Portal 3, Half-Life 3... Biz bekliyoruz. Gaben <2. Neyse, oyun mükemmel. Bir an çok gülerken, bir anda hüzünlenebiliyorsunuz. Oynamanız gerekiyor.

Quando comprai questo gioco nel natale del 2013 non riuscivo a credere a i miei occhi, gioco vivamente consigliato! Potenzialmente anche se non si ha giocato al primo, pur essendo un sequel fa un buon lavoro a introdurre tutto quanto senza buchi di trama e vi verrà probabilmente voglia di comprarvelo una volta finito il gioco. 
Seppur possa esser tranquillamente finito qualche pomeriggio, la campagna Co-op è lunga e sempre divertente.
Stra-consigliato su tutti i fronti! Definitivamente un gioco da avere in libreria Steam.

+ Tecnicamente Spettacorale
+ La modalità Co-op è veramente uno spasso.
+ Tanti segreti sparsi qua e la per i livelli.
+ Introduzione ottima anche se non si ha giocato il primo.
+ Ambientazioni create con cura

- Ma GladOS non era esplosa?
- Mancano i pop corn assieme al gioco.

Voto

Relizzazione ottima, gioco fantastico con una storia ben realizzata, avvincente e piena di umor e sarcasmo. Consigliatissimo!!

A truly well made 1st person puzzle platformer by valve.
Portal (1) was a great little demo that got such a great reception they decided to make a follow up. Portal 2 is essentially the same as portal 1, but now a full AAA title, a bigger story, a fantastic well written antagonist, great humor and atmosphere. There are some new game play added, but the idea is still the same -  Get out of the (areas) by using the portal gun. Some puzzles are really quite clever.

If you like the first portal, you must have this one too. Now it also has a co-op game and steam-workshop that ads a lot to the game, but the campaign alone is well worth the price of the admission.

Even though the source engine might be a little dated, it still works absolutely perfect in this game. I never found myself thinking the game was old. What the games is trying to achieve, it does really well. It is quite a gloomy and sad place in a way, even though there is lots of clever and fun humor.

I found myself coming back to the game at times, even though I have completed it. It just feels nice to complete again, and the antagonist(s) is(are) that good you don't mind hearing her(him) again.

Runs well on most PCs and still manages to look great. I have no complains about this game. It is a very smooth experience. Runs better with mouse and keyboard even though it is quite well optimized for a controller.
Really fun game, it has story, it has depth, it has potatoes and portal.
Супер!

Both Portal's are very strategic and challenging games, but this one takes the... cake. Currently on sale for $4.99, I got this game as a gift, but would definitely purchase if necessary. The co-op is something that I HAVE to bring up. You have the choice of playing with a random person or a friend, and it saves your progress when you leave. That is especially useful, since it took me and my friend Seb a year (off and on) to complete it. You also have the opportunity to create your OWN levels on the workshop, so that other people can download them and play.


Overall Score: 10/10 (One of my favorites)

It's Portal 2. 
If you just found out about this game. I must say, Welcome to the world. I hope your stay underneath that rock was plesant.

One of the best games of the past era. Hands down.

It took the exxelence that is Portal 1. And added an amazing storyline, New gameplay elements, and a whole ton of new levels to it.

Gameplay
Gameplay is fairly simple. Left click for One portal. Right click for the other. Move, jump and hold item. That's it.
These controls could be explained to a monkey. And he would understand it perfectly.
But that is a good thing. Better to keep the controls simple.

The game itself, Is an improved version of portal 1. Some added gameplay features. But what was the biggest add-on was a full length story. Portal 1 had a nice story, but it was short.
Portal 2. Is like 10 portal 1's in one. Lengthy story that gives you more insight on who Glados is. Who you are, And how Aperture science, became Aperture science. 
And it does with new amazing gameplay elements, like Jump pads. Gels, Lazer beams, Gravity beams and i could continue. 
But the best thing this game does it it's learning cuve. It start fairly simple. and slowly grows. Each new chapter gives you something new. And then it spends some time giving you the chance to familarize with it. Then adds some previous elements. before going to a new element to the game. It's nice because you aren't thrown into a big puddle of mess straight away.

The story is just amazing.
I could talk about the story for hours. But I won't
the story has humor, something a lot of game stories lack these days. And this is it's strongest point, storywise. Witty new jokes, that sometimes even could go unnoticed. But will make you laugh each time you hear it. 
The characters in the game are just there to love.
Even Shell, she doesn't say a word. You just get attached to it. And the best thing is. Each character. no matter how minor. plays an important role in the game. Even as small as a raven play a big role in the games story. This certainly wasn't something that was overdone.

Replayability.
It endless.
It litteraly is.
Playing the story missions a couple of times is always fun. Just to hear the witty comments about combustible lemons makes me laugh each time.
But also the Steam community adds to the replayability. Each day tons of new levels get uploaded to try. Some pure gold, Others should be buried under a deep pile of.... well you can finish it.
But just playing a level someone else created is amazing. Some just let you think in a completely different way. This is a good thing.

All and all.
Great game. Great story, great replay value. Even if it would cost €100, it would still be worth his money.
